main: Main page + page with a list of authors + author's page (only pages with content without widgets)
team: Page with team members + page with worklog
search: Page with list of authors contains search widget
design: Design (typography, icons, colors, links + buttons + input are styled)
cms: Contentful / netlify cms is used for content management
styleguideTool: Storybook/styleguidist/other react styleguide tool usage for the page with styles
